mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONSULTING( CON_NUM, MEM_NUM, CON_TYPE, CON_TITLE, CON_CONTENT ) VALUES ( CONSULTING_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mem_num}, #{con_type}, #{con_title}, #{con_content} )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT c.con_num, c.con_type, c.con_title, c.con_content, c.con_rdate, c.con_mdate, m.*, r.con_re_cnt, ROWNUM rnum FROM consulting c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN MEMBER_DETAIL USING (mem_num) )m on c.mem_num = m.mem_num LEFT JOIN ( select con_num, count(*) as con_re_cnt from con_reply group by con_num )r on r.con_num = c.con_num WHERE #{pageNum} * #{pageItemNum} >= ROWNUM
ORDER BY con_num DESC ) a WHERE rnum > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{pageItemNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE consulting SET con_title=#{con_title}, con_type=#{con_type}, con_content=#{con_content}, con_mdate=sysdate WHERE con_num=#{con_num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT c.con_re_num, c.con_num, c.con_re_content, c.con_re_rdate, c.con_re_mdate, c.con_re_status, c.doc_num, d.doc_email, d.mem_name, d.mem_id, d.mem_photo, d.mem_photoname, d.doc_history, h.hos_num, h.hos_addr, h.hos_name, h.hos_tell1, rownum rnum FROM con_reply c LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM MEMBER m LEFT OUTER JOIN doctor_detail d on m.mem_num=d.doc_num ) d ON c.doc_num = d.doc_num LEFT OUTER JOIN hospital h ON d.hos_num = h.hos_num WHERE #{pageNum} * #{pageItemNum} >= rownum and c.con_num=#{con_num} ORDER BY con_re_num DESC )a WHERE rnum > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{pageItemNum}
